Detailed Description

This sensor class is used to retrieve image data

std::string  _camera_info_topic 
)

The constructor for the camera class.

Parameters
_namethe name of the sensor, required by the base sensor class
_nhthe nodehandle to publish data on
_image_topicthe topic to retrieve image data from
_camera_info_topicthe topic holding information about the camera
